prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Trail Blazers vs. Pelicans
Recent trade: $50,000.00 on Pelicans
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/nba-por-nop-2025-12-11

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
The Portland Trail Blazers are set to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday, December 11, 2025, at 5:00 PM PST in New Orleans. ([blazersedge.com](https://www.blazersedge.com/trail-blazers-news/105963/portland-trail-blazers-schedule-update-nba-cup-december-pelicans-warriors?utm_source=openai))

**Recent Performances:**

- **Portland Trail Blazers:** The Blazers have struggled recently, losing five of their last six games. In their most recent outing on December 8, they were defeated 119-96 by the Memphis Grizzlies. Key players Jrue Holiday (calf), Donovan Clingan (lower leg), Robert Williams III (illness), and Matisse Thybulle (thumb) were sidelined during this game. ([cbssports.com](https://www.cbssports.com/nba/news/depleted-trail-blazers-wrap-trip-vs-struggling-pelicans/?utm_source=openai))

- **New Orleans Pelicans:** The Pelicans have also been on a downward trajectory, losing six consecutive games. Their latest loss was a 119-101 defeat to the Brooklyn Nets on December 7, wher...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will SC Braga win on 2025-12-11?
Recent trade: $1,075.00 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/uel-ogc-scb-2025-12-11

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
SC Braga is set to face OGC Nice in the UEFA Europa League on December 11, 2025, at the Allianz Riviera in Nice, France. ([uefa.com](https://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/clubs/52336/matches/?utm_source=openai))

**Recent Performance:**

- **SC Braga:** In their most recent match on December 6, 2025, Braga secured a 2-1 victory against Famalicão in the Primeira Liga. ([wincomparator.com](https://www.wincomparator.com/predictions/sporting-braga-santa-clara-7697086/?utm_source=openai))

- **OGC Nice:** Nice has struggled recently, losing their last five matches, including a 3-1 defeat to Lorient on November 30, 2025. ([footballan.com](https://footballan.com/game/nice-sc-braga-2025-12-11/?utm_source=openai))

**Head-to-Head:**

This will be the first encounter between SC Braga and OGC Nice.

**Match Prediction:**

Analysts predict a win for SC Braga, citing Nice's recent poor form and Braga's consistent performance. ([footballan.com](https://footballan.com/game/nice-sc-braga-2025-12-11/?u...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will Hamas agree to disarm by December 31?
Recent trade: $1,387.93 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-hamaz-disarm-by-december-31

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 11, 2025, Hamas has not agreed to disarm by December 31. The group has consistently rejected full disarmament, proposing instead a weapons "freeze" or storage as part of a broader ceasefire agreement with Israel. Khaled Meshaal, a senior Hamas leader, stated that total disarmament is "unacceptable," emphasizing that the proposal involves freezing or storing weapons to prevent military escalation from Gaza. ([hurriyetdailynews.com](https://www.hurriyetdailynews.com/hamas-proposes-weapons-freeze-in-return-for-long-term-truce-216685?utm_source=openai))

Israeli officials have responded by asserting that Hamas "will be disarmed" as part of the U.S.-sponsored peace plan for Gaza. An Israeli government official stated, "There will be no future for Hamas under the 20-point plan. The terror group will be disarmed and Gaza will be demilitarized." ([al-monitor.com](https://www.al-monitor.com/originals/2025/12/israel-says-hamas-will-be-disarmed-after-group-proposes-weapons-freeze?u...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus strongly predicts "NO" for Hamas disarming, with unanimous agreement across all six AI models. For the basketball game, opinions are split between "NO" and "NO_TRADE" due to both teams' injuries and poor form, creating uncertainty. Regarding the soccer match, a majority predicts "YES" for a Braga win, citing their stronger recent form against Nice's losing streak, though one model dissents.

groq.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The Portland Trail Blazers have struggled recently, losing five of their last six games, and key players are sidelined, making it unlikely they will win against the New Orleans Pelicans.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: SC Braga has been performing consistently, securing a recent 2-1 victory, while OGC Nice has lost their last five matches, making a Braga win more likely.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Hamas has consistently rejected full disarmament, and their proposal for a weapons "freeze" or storage indicates they are unlikely to agree to disarm by December 31.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: Both teams are on significant losing streaks and dealing with key injuries, making the outcome highly uncertain despite the large recent bet on the Pelicans.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The news context indicates SC Braga is in better recent form compared to OGC Nice, who have lost five consecutive matches, supporting the prediction for a Braga win.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Recent reports confirm Hamas has explicitly rejected full disarmament, proposing only a weapons "freeze," while Israel's statements about future disarmament do not indicate an agreement will be reached by the December 31 deadline.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The Portland Trail Blazers are significantly depleted with several key players sidelined and have lost five of their last six games, placing them in a worse position than the struggling Pelicans.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: SC Braga is in good form, winning their last match, while OGC Nice has lost their last five matches, and analysts are predicting a Braga victory.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Hamas has consistently rejected full disarmament, with a senior leader stating it is "unacceptable," offering only a weapons freeze or storage instead.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: Both teams are struggling, but the Pelicans are playing at home and received a significant $50,000 trade backing them. Portland is dealing with multiple injuries (Holiday, Clingan, Williams III, Thybulle) which severely weakens their roster for this road game.

MARKET 2: NO
Reasoning: While Braga has been performing well and Nice has lost five straight, winning away in European competition is always challenging. The recent $1,075 trade on No suggests the market sees value in betting against an outright Braga win (draw is possible).

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Hamas has explicitly stated that total disarmament is "unacceptable" through senior leader Khaled Meshaal, proposing only a weapons "freeze" instead. With only 20 days remaining until December 31 and no indication of any shift toward full disarmament, this outcome is extremely unlikely.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: Both the Trail Blazers and Pelicans are currently struggling, with significant losing streaks and injuries affecting key players. The outcome of the game seems unpredictable, making it a less favorable betting opportunity.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: SC Braga recently secured a victory and analysts favor them to win against OGC Nice, who have been on a losing streak. The recent trade betting on "No" may offer a more favorable position to bet "Yes" given the circumstances.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: Hamas has explicitly rejected full disarmament, suggesting a weapons freeze instead. Israeli officials have insisted on disarmament, but given Hamas's clear stance, it is highly unlikely they will agree to disarm by December 31.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: Both teams are severely struggling with injury issues and poor form (Blazers 1-5, Pelicans on 6-game losing streak). The $50k bet on Pelicans suggests home court advantage, but with both teams depleted and inconsistent, this is too unpredictable to confidently trade.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: Braga just won 2-1 and faces a Nice team that has lost their last five consecutive matches including a 3-1 defeat to Lorient. Analysts predict a Braga win given Nice's terrible recent form, and the recent $1,075 bet on "No" (Braga not winning) appears to be going against the clear momentum.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: Hamas has explicitly rejected full disarmament as "unacceptable" and only proposed a weapons "freeze" instead. With just 20 days until December 31 and Hamas's clear public stance against disarming, there is virtually no chance of agreement by the deadline.
